attributes.action: make illegal the act of photography on railway stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Photography on railway stations is hazardous, in that flash photography can momentarily blind or affexct the sight of drivers and safety critical platform staff. It also creates a burden on the BTP who have to investigate cases of such people reported as acting suspiciously, when they could otherwise be employed on real crime-prevention.
